title: Exquisite Family Duplex with Modern Luxury in Zatorze
description: Introducing an immaculately renovated duplex offering four spacious bedrooms and two elegant bathrooms, spanning 170 sqm of refined living. Bathed in natural light, the open-plan dining area seamlessly adjoins the contemporary kitchen, creating an inviting space for family gatherings. Enjoy state-of-the-art underfloor heating throughout, complemented by premium finishes for maximum comfort. Set amidst meticulously landscaped surroundings, this home truly defines sophisticated family living.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in Leszno’s vibrant Zatorze neighborhood, this property delivers the best of both worlds: a family-friendly ambiance paired with the lively urban energy characteristic of a flourishing district. Just moments from the city’s renowned business and cultural quarters, residents also benefit from proximity to everyday conveniences, esteemed schools, parks, and diverse dining experiences.
target_buyer: Perfect for discerning families seeking a premium move-in ready home that balances sophisticated comfort with functionality for busy modern life.
market_positioning: This elegant duplex stands as a rare offering in Leszno’s Zatorze, appealing to families seeking modern luxury features in a well-connected family-friendly enclave.
